overview:
As Senior Vice President of Customer Experience, Jackie is responsible for customer success across implementation, education, support and renewals. “My goal is to ensure every customer finds value in the use of AtTask to manage their work,” says Golden, “providing them the online and personal resources and information necessary to help their company utilize best practices and ensure their success.”

Jackie joined AtTask in 2009 as the Vice President of Global Services and Support and has more than fifteen years of experience in the software industry at companies such as Hyperion, PowerCerv, Cognos, Ascential and IBM building top performing PSO organizations as well as owning her own Executive Consulting Services business, Golden Enterprises.

Jackie’s educational background includes an undergraduate degree in International Business at California Polytechnic University, San Luis Obispo and an Executive MBA from San Diego State University.

Outside of the business world, Jackie has a passion for horses and compete regularly in local competitions. She also enjoys hiking and skiing with her family.
